articles.author: Kai Nicol-Schwarz
articles.title: Big Tech sees over $1 trillion wiped from stocks as fears of AI bubble ignite sell-off - CNBC
articles.description: Fears over AI spending have sparked a sell-off among tech stocks.
articles.content: Amazon shares sunk more than 9% on Friday after the company's hefty spending forecast surprised investors who were already wary that the artificial intelligence boom is at risk of becoming a bubble. … [+2418 chars]
